title: Unspecified Error
body: So I quit playing league for awhile, and the icon on my desktop quit working to launch the game. My first thought was to uninstall and reinstall. The uninstall was successful, but upon trying to reinstall the game, I always get the same error message: unspecified error. I've tried running the Hextech Repair Tool, but when I go to my Riot Games folder, I don't actually have the client .exe file, just the launcher, so I cant actually run the tool. I really want to get back into the game, so some help would be greatly appreciated. I'm running on windows 10.

replies.body: Hmmmmm yea missing that client.exe is going to be a problem. I'd suggest running the Repair Tool with the options **clean uninstall and reinstall** turned on to make sure all the files were properly wiped and then get reinstalled correctly.
